channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Michelle Obama's 3rd consecutive DNC speech slamming Trump rips his 'racist lies,' 'narrow view of the world'
item.description: Former first lady Michelle Obama took aim at former President Trump in her DNC speech on Tuesday night suggesting that he is driven by racism and "generational wealth."

item.title: Barack Obama tells Democrats 'mutual respect' should be their message this election
item.description: Former President Barack Obama urged all Americans, regardless of their background and political ideology, to unite behind Vice President Kamala Harris in an impassioned speech Tuesday night at the Democratic National Convention.

item.title: 2024 Democratic National Convention: Live Updates
item.description: Follow along for live updates and analysis from the NR team on the Democratic National Convention.

item.title: Did Georgia’s Brad Raffensperger Illegally Change Absentee Ballot Rules In 2020?
item.description: Georgia voters deserve to know whether Brad Raffensperger, the state election board, and county boards of election violated the law in the 2020 election.

item.title: DNC paints Harris as ‘law and order’ standard-bearer as past comments on ‘militarization of police’ resurface
item.description: Kamala Harris has tried to burnish her prosecutorial credentials as she faces off with Donald Trump, despite years of criticizing police and reportedly supporting tenets of the defund movement.

item.title: Michelle Obama accuses Trump of 'racist lies'
item.description: Former first lady Michelle Obama on Tuesday accused former President Donald Trump of telling "racist lies" as she christened Vice President Kamala Harris as the heir to her husband's hope-and-change coalition.

item.title: No More Tax Credits for Hollywood, Please
item.description: Film tax credits have been tried just about everywhere, and they’re a bad idea.

item.title: Kamala Harris Wants To Memory-Hole Her Border Record Because It’s Disqualifying
item.description: Kamala Harris' prior positions on immigration policy and border security are a threat to our national sovereignty.

item.title: Walz to accept Democrat vice presidential nomination on night 3 of DNC
item.description: Minnesota Gov. Tim Walz is expected to formally accept the Democrat vice presidential nomination Wednesday night in Chicago.

item.title: Emhoff on Harris: 'Empathy is her strength'
item.description: Second gentleman Doug Emhoff took to the stage at the Democratic National Convention to talk about how strong is his wife, Vice President Kamala Harris.

item.title: Democrats’ Brazen Covid Revisionism
item.description: The first night of the DNC spun the pandemic as a story of Democratic managerial competence. The truth is much different.

item.title: Despite Parent Complaints, Suburban Missouri District Keeps R-Rated Books In School Library
item.description: Graphic descriptions of intercourse and images of full-frontal nudity are in books available for kids to read in a Kansas City suburb's school library.

item.title: Trump, rejecting advice, tries mockery, insults, AI against Kamala, but is it working?
item.description: As 2024's election night approaches, Donald Trump is leaning into his classic campaign strategy. However, Republican allies are suggesting he lean to policy.

item.title: Harris relies on Republicans to make case for election
item.description: Vice President Kamala Harris' campaign ramped up its efforts to court Republican votes by inviting several party members to speak at the Democratic National Convention.

item.title: Kamala Harris Is No Investor
item.description: Like any huckster working in a boiler room, Harris is hoping to find people credulous enough to believes what’s too good to be true.

item.title: How Kamala’s Economic Plans Would Send ‘Bidenflation’ Into Overdrive
item.description: The gusher of federal money designed to make health care and housing 'affordable' will do exactly the opposite.

item.title: Three candidates advance in ranked choice primary for Alaska's at-large district
item.description: Three candidates advance to the general election for Alaska's at-large congressional district after the state's ranked choice primary.

item.title: Report: Biden secretly altered U.S. nuclear strategy
item.description: President Biden has reportedly altered the U.S. strategic nuclear plans toward opposing China's burgeoning nuclear arsenal and preparing for possible nuclear coordination between China, Russia and North Korea.

item.title: The Biden Family Scandal
item.description: The impeachment report prepared by House Republicans is an essential part of any record of the Biden-Harris administration.

item.title: Yes, Kamala’s Price Controls Lead To Socialism
item.description: If you don't want to be called a commie, don't act like one.
